body_html:
I will suggest you to checkout uber/horovod, which uses NCCL and MPI for inter-node all reduce.

AFAIK, we are not using NCCL for inter-node GPU training, and perhaps the reason is simply because that we would also like to support non-NVidia GPU (ROCm support was recently added) for inter-node training. Nevertheless, PRs are always welcomed :)

body:
I will suggest you to checkout uber/horovod, which uses NCCL and MPI for inter-node all reduce.

AFAIK, we are not using NCCL for inter-node GPU training, and perhaps the reason is simply because that we would also like to support non-NVidia GPU (ROCm support was recently added) for inter-node training. Nevertheless, PRs are always welcomed :)
